title: Comprehensive Health Metrics Integration
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to access real-time health metrics from various monitoring devices for my clients so that I can track their health status accurately and respond promptly to any anomalies, while ensuring data privacy and clarity in communication.

title: Customizable Alert Settings for Proactive Health Monitoring
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to customize alert settings for health anomalies so that I can ensure timely and appropriate responses without alarming my clients unnecessarily.

title: Care Plan Customization Tools
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want to customize care plans for each client based on their unique needs and preferences so that I can provide personalized and effective care while ensuring clarity and respect for their privacy.

title: Holistic Wellness Tracking
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to track both physical and mental health metrics of my clients in real-time so that I can ensure their overall well-being and respond appropriately to any concerns.

title: Caregiver Collaboration Features – Team Chat Functionality for Real-Time Communication
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want a team chat functionality within ALFRED so that I can communicate in real-time with other caregivers and healthcare professionals, ensuring coordinated care and timely updates without compromising client privacy.

title: User-Centric Data Visualization – Simplified Dashboards for Quick Insights
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want a simplified dashboard that allows me to quickly track and verify the health status of multiple clients so that I can efficiently manage care tasks without overwhelming my clients or myself.

title: Secure Data Sharing Protocols – Granular Access Controls for Caregivers
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want granular access controls for health data so that I can monitor multiple clients' health information securely and ensure their privacy is respected.

title: Integrated Medication Management – Automated Medication Reminders
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want an automated medication reminder system that allows me to customize notification settings so that I can ensure my clients receive timely reminders without causing confusion or distress.
